verses.roman:
tabe mahāprabhu sabāra nṛtya rākhilā
pūrvavat āpane nṛtya karite lāgilā

synonyms: tabe—thereafter; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sabāra—of all of them; nṛtya rākhilā—stopped the dancing; pūrvavat—as previously; āpane—personally; nṛtya—dancing; karite lāgilā—began to perform.
translation: Then Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu stopped the dancing of the others, and as He had done previously, He personally began to dance.
